title: Portal Maps (from Gamespot)
description:
If you smart like most people, you&#039;ll understand that Gamespot host files for download but require you to register an account with them to do so. Given the fact that there are a lot of maps available through Gamespot and you are forced to download each one by one with a free account, it&#039;d be a lot easier to use a torrent.

So here it is, I did the faffing about so you don&#039;t have to.


 - Druss
